content: pattern for a creeper inspired by the video game minecraft i do not own the character all pieces are worked flat and then sewn together total of five pages including images to help along the way and how to colour change hook size s 2 5mm yarn weight 8ply colours green colour a black colour b *you will need over 100g of green* abbreviations us terms magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet fsc - foundation single_crochet * … * - repeat single_crochet around - single_crochet for the rest of the row cca - change to colour a ccb - change to colour b
